Klasse MenuBarController

java.lang.Object
application.controller.MenuBarController
public class MenuBarController extends Object
Controller for the universal menu bar.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Creates a new MenuBarController and initializes the menu bar.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • MenuBarController

      public MenuBarController()
      Creates a new MenuBarController and initializes the menu bar.

  • Methodendetails

    • loadFile

      public ArrayList<Student> loadFile(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Loads student data from a selected file.

      The method uses object deserialization to read Student objects from the file and returns them as a list.

      Parameter:
      stage - the stage used to display the file chooser
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of loaded students

    • saveFile

      public void saveFile(javafx.stage.Stage stage, ArrayList<Student> students)
      Saves student data to a selected file.

      The method serializes all Student objects and writes them to the chosen file.

      Parameter:
      stage - the stage used to display the file chooser
      students - the list of students to save

    • getUniversalMenuBar

      public UniversalMenuBar getUniversalMenuBar()
      Returns the universal menu bar.
      Gibt zurück:
      the UniversalMenuBar instance
